name: Alien Headbang
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 32 (see its page here) in less than 48 hours, this 3D game takes remote finger squish battles -- as famously enacted by Kids in the Hall -- and takes it to a whole new level with alien saucer dudes, a destructible classroom, confetti, incessant dance music, and... well... yeah, it's a jam game. That's all you get. :)

CONTROLS (no in-game help, I apologize)
  • LOOK: Mouse
  • MOVE: A,D or Left,Right
  • SQUEEZE: Left click (be sure to hold!)
  • ADJUST FINGERS: Mousewheel
  • DUCK: Right click (and hold)
Have fun, and please post your score! Anything over 18 is pretty rad!
